#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<stdio.h>
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;

ll abs(ll x)
{
	return (x<0) ? (-x) : x;
}

int main()
{
	ll t,m=1;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	ll n,k;
	scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);

	ll arr[n];
	priority_queue<ll> Q;

	for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&arr[i]);
		Q.push(-arr[i]);
	}
	
	ll ans = 0,flag=0;
	
	if(n%(k-1)!=1 && k!=2)
	{
		int cnt = n%(k-1);
		ll sum =0 ;
		for(int i=0;i<cnt;i++)
		{
			ll tmp1 = Q.top();
			Q.pop();
			sum += abs(tmp1);
			if(Q.empty())
			{
				flag = 1;
				break;
			}
		}
		ans += sum;
		Q.push(-sum);
	}
	
	if(!flag)
	{
	while(!Q.empty())
	{
		ll c = 0;
		ll sum = 0;
		while(c<k)
		{
			c++;
			ll tmp1 = Q.top();
			Q.pop();
			sum += abs(tmp1);	
			if(Q.empty())
			{
				flag = 1;
				break;
			}
		}
		ans += sum;
		if(flag)
			break;
		Q.push(-sum);
	}
	}
	cout << "Case " << m << ": " << ans << endl;
	m++;
	}
	
return 0;
}
